00093 inline double Eval_Forchheimer_VDF_Face::calculer_terme_source(int num_face) const
00094 {
00095   double U = (vitesse->valeurs())[num_face];
00096   return -Cf/sqrt(modK->getK(porosite))*volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face)*dabs(U)*U;
00097 }
00098 
00099 inline void Eval_Forchheimer_VDF_Face::calculer_terme_source(int ,
00100                                                              DoubleVect& ) const
00101 {
00102 // EMPTY;
00103 }
00104 
00105 inline double Eval_Forchheimer_VDF_Face::calculer_terme_source_bord(int num_face) const
00106 {
00107   return calculer_terme_source(num_face);
00108 }

00113 // EMPTY;
